videos.title: 2019 True Grit Epic Gravel & MTB Race
videos.description:
True Grit Gravel Epic is an 84 mile gravel race in Santa Clara, Utah put on by Gro Promotions.  Here's a link to their website: https://gropromotions.com/

This is an incredible way to see Southern Utah and race in what's become one of Utah's most difficult mountain bike and gravel races.

Thanks for watching!
